title: Update engine loop to continue after handoff signals
description:
Modify the main loop in internal/engine/engine.go to continue to next task after handoff signals:

Current behavior (simplified):
```go
signal, reason := ParseSignals(output)
switch signal {
case SignalComplete:
    e.ticks.CloseTask(...)
case SignalEject:
    e.ticks.SetManual(...)  // and stop or continue?
case SignalBlocked:
    // ... handle blocked
}
```

New behavior:
```go
signal, context := ParseSignals(output)
if signal != SignalNone {
    if err := e.handleSignal(task, signal, context); err != nil {
        return err
    }
    // IMPORTANT: Continue to next task, don't block on human
    // The task is now awaiting human, so tk next won't return it
    continue  // back to top of loop
}
```

Key change: After ANY handoff signal, immediately continue to next available task. Never block waiting for human response.

Acceptance criteria:
- [ ] Engine continues to next task after handoff signal
- [ ] No blocking on human response
- [ ] Loop terminates when no tasks available (all awaiting or done)
- [ ] Budget tracking continues across handoffs
